txstates.txstate: At least one fol. is missing in quire 34.

taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are not visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written below the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a: fols. 1r-132rb Hand b: fols. 133-259vb, Hand c: fols. 260ra-264ra

rubrications.rubrication: Incipit of the texts; elements of Ethiopic numerals; elements of the punctuation signs.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Readings are indicated by the commemorative dates of the martyrs written in the main hands, in red, in the upper margin:
